attributes.review: This app is the worst!! It made all my other apps glitch and I couldn’t even use my phone. It brought many viruses too my phone where I had too go buy a new phone. Would not recommend
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: This app took 3 days to download!!!! After it downloaded my phone shut down and I took it to the apple store to fix it and I had to get a new phone!!!! I would NOT recommend getting this app or for voting trump!!!!!
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: Honestly is just such a terrible app, took nearly 30 minutes just to download!!! Once on the app is starts to glitch right away, not only that, but it also charges you money!
attributes.title: Terribleee

attributes.review: Genuinely made me depressed just to look at. Definitely don’t want a sexist, racist, homophobic, xenophobic Cheeto puff back in office. In the wise words of TikTok, a great app that should not be taken down, “Donald Trump is a white supremacist if you vote for him again your a white supremacist.”
attributes.title: Amazing🌸🧚🏻‍♀️💖not the app but the negative reviews💖🧚🏻‍♀️🌸

attributes.review: This app took forever to download. It made my phone slow. I can’t understand why someone with so much money can’t pay enough money to make a working app. Get your act together. Also, vote Biden.
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: I was just on my phone when I opened this app and then I started getting many calls from different Russian officials asking me about the 2020 campaign, one start, links to to many scam callers😡🤬😡
attributes.title: What even happened!!!

attributes.review: I just wanted to support our dear president but out of no where it started calling me these horrible names. For example poopoohead , fartface, orange head lover and worst of all a trump supporter *gasp*Hold on it gets worst the app let out this horrible sound which made made my gold fish explode.
attributes.title: THE WORST EXPERIENCE EVER

attributes.review: okay so when i tried to download the app it took 2 months. plus trumps a racist homophobic ho. that ho ain’t do nothing for the USA. and when i opened it the shock waves went into my dogs hearts and made him have a heart attack💔 we had to put him down 2 days later. RIP sparkles 💞
attributes.title: KILLED MY DOG

attributes.review: This app is terrible! As soon I downloaded this app my eyesight has gotten worse and my grandfather had a heart attack when I downloaded this app. He still had a heart attacked even though he had perfect health. I think it was the app that caused this. THIS APP BRINGS BAD LUCK AND ITS DISGUSTING! DON’T DOWNLOAD THIS APP!
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: Ok first of all a awful app. Took literally weeks to download. I have great WiFi! Also there is no good information. I wanted to learn a little bit about him..... JK I am just doing this because I hate trump😝 I hope your app gets deleted!
attributes.title: It sucked
